Layout/LeadingCommentSpace.description:
Description

Comments should start with a space.
Layout/LeadingCommentSpace.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowDoxygenCommentStyle: False (type: bool)
AllowGemfileRubyComment: False (type: bool)
AllowRBSInlineAnnotation: False (type: bool)
AllowSteepAnnotation: False (type: bool)
